akn:section.akn:heading: Consolidation, restructuring, or reengineering of organizations, functions, or activities: notificat

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Strategic Sourcing Plan of Action Defined.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In this section, the term “Strategic Sourcing Plan of Action” means a Strategic Sourcing Plan of Action for the Department of Defense (as identified in the Department of Defense Interim Guidance dated February 29, 2000, or any successor Department of Defense guidance or directive) in effect for a fiscal year.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Notification of Decision To Execute Plan.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) If a decision is made to consolidate, restructure, or reengineer an organization, function, or activity of the Department of Defense pursuant to a Strategic Sourcing Plan of Action described in subsection (a), and such consolidation, restructuring, or reengineering would result in a manpower reduction affecting 50 or more personnel of the Department of Defense (including military and civilian personnel)—
